name: ejs-bootstrap-sass-boilerplate
description: EJS and Sass Boilerplate is a simple web application template that combines the power of EJS (Embedded JavaScript) for easy HTML templating and Sass (Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets) for efficient CSS pre-processing. Kickstart your web development projects with this boilerplate, which provides a clean and organized project structure, allowing you to quickly build dynamic web pages and stylesheets.
